game_description: Fight to survive a zombie apocalypse: with a tank! Experience the action-packed storyline with M4A3 Sherman "Cherry Bomb" and her stalwart crew. Vaporize hordes of enemies with cannon-fire or crush them beneath steel treads! A colorful cast of characters bring the adventure to life. Crunchies is an epic action-packed battle for survival aboard a restored Sherman tank as Hank and his crew struggle to survive a zombie apocalypse. Key Features: - Annihilate massive enemy hordes with superior firepower! - 16 exciting open environments to explore, chock-full of destructible objects! - Simplified controls: thumbstick drives, point to aim, trigger/grip fire cannon/machinegun. - Graphics that maximize your Quest's potential, plus tweakable settings for future headsets. - 4 levels of difficulty offer great replay value.
review_1: I recommend this game for FPS shooter lovers.
